content: A {{Computer Science}} student and {{Machine Learning}} enthusiast.
My primary focus is on {{Machine Learning}} and {{Deep Learning}}, with experience in developing various AI applications.
I also enjoy programming in {{C++}} and building {{innovative projects}}.
I have a strong interest in {{Computer Vision}} and {{Generative AI}}, with projects in both areas.
I'm a {{passionate}} developer, always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow.
You can connect with me on LinkedIn.
Check out my projects and code on GitHub.
Feel free to email me at patelchaitany93@gmail.com.
{{Click}} on a section on the left to learn more about my {{work}} and {{skills}}.
You can also {{navigate}} through the sections using the {{arrow keys}} or {{Vim motions}}.
